meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Toni Johnson Jeff Crosby Udit Banerjea Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7272.

td.p: Toni Johnson, a retail sales associate from Charlotte, North Carolina
Jeff Crosby, a youth ministry consultant from Rochester, New York
Udit Banerjea, an international relations graduate student from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,300)

tr.td: ALL THE PRESIDENTS' CHILDREN
FROM THE GERMAN
OFFICIAL STATE ANIMALS
TRANS"PO"TATION
THE BEATLES... GEAR!
INDIRECT QUOTES
(Alex: In which you have to correct the part that is in parentheses.)

tr.td: Udit
Jeff
Toni
SUTTER'S FORT
TOUGH EUROPEAN CAPITALS

(Alex: And the X, the letter X will either be the first or the second letter in each correct response.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
